metadata.comments: This connector used to perform different actions on alerts , device and threats using CarbonBlack cloud endpoint API.
metadata.author: Dharma Reddy,CarbonBlack

metadata.description: Name of the carbon black connector

uiDefinition.description: The API Key for this api

properties.description: The Carbon Black Cloud is a cloud-native endpoint protection platform (EPP) that provides what you need to secure your endpoints using a single, lightweight agent and an easy-to-use console.

info.title: Default title
info.description: The Carbon Black Cloud is a cloud-native endpoint protection platform (EPP) that provides what you need to secure your endpoints using a single, lightweight agent and an easy-to-use console.

activation_code.description: Device activation code to register the sensor with a specific org

activation_code_expiry_time.description: When the activation code expires and cannot be used to register a device

ad_group_id.description: Active Directory group ID to match

appliance_name.description: Name of the Appliance the Virtual Machine (VM) is associated with

appliance_uuid.description: The Uuid of the appliance the VM is associated with

av_last_scan_time.description: The last time a local scan completed

av_master.description: Whether the device is an AV Master

av_update_servers.description: A list of device’s AV servers

cluster_name.description: Name of the cluster. A cluster is a group of hosts

current_sensor_policy_name.description: The name of the policy currently configured on the sensor

datacenter_name.description: Name of the underlying datacenter. The datacenter managed object provides the interface to the common container object for hosts, virtual machines, networks, and datastores

deployment_type.description: The device’s deployment type, a classification that is determined by its lifecycle management policy

deregistered_time.description: Time when the deregister request was received

device_owner_id.description: The identifier for the device owner associated with the device

email.description: The email address for the device owner

esx_host_name.description: Name of the ESX host on which the VM is deployed

esx_host_uuid.description: Uuid of the ESX host on which VM is deployed

first_name.description: The first name of the device owner

last_device_policy_changed_time.description: The last time the sensor changed from one policy to another

last_device_policy_requested_time.description: The last time the sensor checked for changes to the policy

last_external_ip_address.description: The last IP address of the device according to the Carbon Black Cloud; can differ from last_internal_ip_address due to network proxy or NAT

last_internal_ip_address.description: The last IP address of the device reported by the sensor

last_location.description: The device’s current location relative to the organization’s network, based on the current IP address and the device’s registered DNS domain suffix

last_name.description: The last name of the device owner

last_policy_updated_time.description: The last time the current policy received an update

last_reported_time.description: The last time when the Carbon Black Cloud received one or more events reported by the sensor

last_reset_time.description: The last time the device was reset

last_shutdown_time.description: The last time the device was shutdown

login_user_name.description: The last user logged in on the device

mac_address.description: The media access control (MAC) address for the device’s primary interface

middle_name.description: The middle name of the device owner

os_version.description: The operating system and version of the endpoint

passive_mode.description: Whether the device is in bypass

policy_id.description: The policy identifier assigned to the device

policy_name.description: The policy name assigned to the device. May not match

policy_override.description: Whether the policy was manually assigned to override mass sensor management

quarantined.description: An indicator that the device is in quarantine mode

registered_time.description: When the device was registered with the Carbon Black Cloud

scan_last_action_time.description: The last time the background scan was started or stopped

scan_last_complete_time.description: The time the last background scan completed

scan_status.description: The status of the background scan

sensor_kit_type.description: The type of sensor installed on the device

sensor_out_of_date.description: Whether there is a new version available to be installed

sensor_pending_update.description: Whether the sensor is marked by the Sensor Update Service for a sensor upgrade

sensor_version.description: The version of the installed sensor

target_priority.description: The “Target value” configured in the policy assigned to the sensor

uninstall_code.description: The code to enter when uninstalling the sensor

vcenter_name.description: Name of the vcenter the vm is associated with

vcenter_uuid.description: 128-bit SMBIOS UUID of a vcenter represented as a hexadecimal string

vdi_base_device.description: The identifier of the device from which this device was cloned/re-registered

virtual_machine.description: Whether this device is a Virtual Machine (VMware AppDefense integration)

virtualization_provider.description: Name of the VM Virtualization Provider

vm_name.description: Name of the Virtual Machine that the sensor is deployed on

vm_uuid.description: 128-bit SMBIOS UUID of a virtual machine represented as a hexadecimal string

vulnerability_score.description: A score from 0 to 100 indicating the workload’s level of vulnerability with 100 being highly vulnerable

vulnerability_severity.description: The severity level indicating the workload’s vulnerability

end.description: Last contact time end [ start and end are specified as ISO-8601 strings ]

range.description: Last contact time range range can be either all (to indicate all time), or a specific duration specified as -[quantity][unit], where unit is one of

start.description: Last contact time start [ start and end are specified as ISO-8601 strings ]

items.description: Active Directory group ID to match

ad_group_id.description: Active Directory group ID to match

items.description: Carbon Black Cloud Policy ID to match

policy_id.description: Carbon Black Cloud Policy ID to match

items.description: The device’s deployment type, a classification that is determined by its lifecycle management policy

deployment_type.description: The device’s deployment type, a classification that is determined by its lifecycle management policy

items.description: 128-bit SMBIOS UUID of a virtual machine represented as a hexadecimal string

vm_uuid.description: 128-bit SMBIOS UUID of a virtual machine represented as a hexadecimal string

items.description: 128-bit SMBIOS UUID of a vcenter represented as a hexadecimal string

vcenter_uuid.description: 128-bit SMBIOS UUID of a vcenter represented as a hexadecimal string

items.description: The version of the installed sensor [ Format: #.#.#.# ]

sensor_version.description: The version of the installed sensor [ Format: #.#.#.# ]

query.description: query format [ fieldname : value OR/AND fieldname : value ]

rows.description: Maximum number of rows to return

start.description: What row to begin returning results from

action_type.description: Action to perform on selected devices

items.description: List of devices to perform action on
items.default: List of devices to perform action on

toggle.description: Determines whether to enable or disable the action [ Required if action_type is set to QUARANTINE, BYPASS, or BACKGROUND_SCAN ]

policy_id.description: Devices will be updated to this policy ID [ Required if action_type is set to UPDATE_POLICY ]

get.summary: Search for a process metadata by process GUID
get.description: Retrieves the process detail results for a given job_id. Confirm the search has completed by verifying that “contacted” equals “completed”

post.summary: Search for processes events by process GUID
post.description: Fetch the events associated with a given process. These events are often more complete than the enriched events but, unlike the enriched event searches, must be limited to one process at a time.

criteria.description: Criteria is an object that represents values that must be in the results. Either query or criteria/exclusion must be included

exclusions.description: Exclusions is a map that represents values that must not be in the results. Either query or criteria/exclusion must be included

items.description: A list of fields to include in the results, specify * to return all the default fields and add additional fields that are not returned by default

query.description: Query in lucene syntax and/or including value searches. Either query or criteria/exclusion must be included

rows.description: Number of rows to request, can be paginated

start.description: First row to use for pagination

window.description: Window will take priority over start and end if provided

remediation.description: Description or justification for the change

last_update_time.description: The last time the alert was updated

comment.description: Comment to include with the operation

post.description: Update the alert with the current state of the remediation

comment.description: Comment to include with the operation

remediation_state.description: Description or justification for the change

post.summary: Add a note to an alert
post.description: Add a comment to provide context, in the case someone looks in the CBC console.

note.description: A segment of text to attach to the specified Alert [ Max: 255 characters ]
